answers.answer: One cup a day won't hurt you :) you can have up to 220mg of caffeine a day and still have a healthy baby. If I'm feeling down or tired out just plain out miss it I have a cup.
That amount is good. Depends on how much you drink at one time.
I did throughout my whole pregnancy however,  I did have a gestational diabetes scare since the daily coffee intake contained tons of sugar. Just monitor the sugar you use and youll be just fine!
I'm not sure about how many mg's ..but I don't drink that much,  just a  small  regular cup of coffee like they sell in the stores

Look on the canister to see how many mg are in a serving and just keep in mind if you have coffee in the morning you should probably refrain from caffeine the rest of the day thats how I do it. Its easier then checking everything for its mg per serving
They say if your not drinking more that 2 cups a day your fine
Thanks, I think I'll just stop drinking it.. I just read online what are the concerns & its a lil scary.
I drink iced tea once a week, but is say wait till your second trimester as the first trimester is most important

question: Is it really that bad? I just started drinking it for the last two weeks 1 cup every other day.
title: coffee?
